Package org.castor.ddl

This package contains functional classes, exceptions and Main class for DDL generator
Author: Le Duc Bao

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Generator Generator is the interface for various generators.
TypeMapper Interface associates JDBC type to TypeInfo.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGenerator AbstractGenerator is the base class for various DDL generator of specific DB and handles following tasks:
  • Extract information from Mapping to Schema
  • Loop through the schema and provide a skeleton for DDL creation

    AbstractGenerator will automatically extract necessary information for DDL creation.

    		•
    AbstractTypeMapper AbstractTypeMapper is the base class for mapping JDBC supported type and RDBMS data type.
    BaseConfiguration BaseConfiguration handles configuration's key definition.
    Configuration Configuration handle the configuration for DDL generator inclidung load configuration files, manage configuration values
    Created on Jun 4, 2006 - 10:27:35 AM
    GeneratorFactory This class handles the creation for various databse generators
    Created on Jun 7, 2006 - 3:22:36 PM
    GeneratorRegistry Registry for Generator implementations obtained from the configuration.
    KeyRepository KeyRepository handles KeyGenerators.
    Main Main Program
    MappingHelper This class handles all common tasks for manipulating Mapping document
     

    Exception Summary
    GeneratorException GeneratorException, base class for all DDL generator exception
    KeyGenNotSupportException Key generator exception
    KeyNotFoundException Configuration Key does not find exception
    TypeNotFoundException Type not found exception
    WrongFormatException Wrong format exception
     

    Package org.castor.ddl Description

    This package contains functional classes, exceptions and Main class for DDL generator

    Author:
